Bash(git -C /home/dan/src/n8n_cli commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(05-02\): project and user CLI commands with comprehensive test coverage

Implemented complete project and user management command groups following
established CLI patterns from Phases 3-4:

Project commands:
- project list: Display all projects with name and type
- project view: Show project details with member placeholder

User commands:
- user list: Display users with email, name, and role
- user invite: Invite new users with duplicate handling
- user remove: Delete users with confirmation prompt

All commands include proper error handling, verbosity flags, and 16
comprehensive test cases \(all passing\). Quality gates: pytest, mypy, ruff.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(env COMP_WORDS="n8n workflow view" COMP_CWORD=2 _N8N_COMPLETE=zsh_complete n8n:*)

Bash(git -C /home/dan/src/n8n_cli commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(06-03\): shell completion for workflows, projects, and files

Implemented dynamic shell completion system using Typer''s autocompletion:

Shell completion features:
- complete_workflows: Dynamic workflow name completion from n8n API
- complete_projects: Dynamic project name completion from n8n API  
- complete_workflow_files: File path completion for .json files

Integration:
- Added completion to 9 workflow commands \(view, activate, deactivate, pull, push, delete, diff, move, open\)
- Added completion to project view command
- Added completion to 3 member commands \(list, add, remove\)
- Enabled completion in Typer app \(add_completion=True\)

Quality features:
- Silent error handling \(returns empty list on errors, never breaks commands\)
- Comprehensive testing \(test_completion.py\)
- Installation documentation in README

Pre-commit hook added \(.pre-commit-config.yaml\) for code quality automation.

Phase 6 Developer Experience complete - all 3 plans finished.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/dan/src/n8n_cli commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
perf\(tests\): mock time.sleep to eliminate retry wait delays

Added autouse fixture to mock time.sleep globally, eliminating actual wait
delays in retry tests. Test suite now runs in 1.04s instead of 69s \(66x faster\).

Impact:
- All retry decorator tests no longer wait for exponential backoff \(2s/4s/8s\)
- Test behavior unchanged - still validates retry logic
- Massive improvement to developer experience

Before: 268 tests in 69.06s
After: 268 tests in 1.04s

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
